{3}，{T}，牺牲火热愤怒祭祠：火热愤怒祭祠对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于火热愤怒祭祠上充电指示物的数量。
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: Shrine of Burning Rage deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

cards.name: Shrine of Limitless Power
cards.originalText:
在你的维持开始或每当你施放黑色咒语时，在无尽力量祭祠上放置一个充电指示物。
{4}，{T}，牺牲无尽力量祭祠：无尽力量祭祠上每有一个充电指示物，目标牌手便弃一张牌。
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a black spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Limitless Power.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Limitless Power: Target player discards a card for each charge counter on Shrine of Limitless Power.

cards.name: Shrine of Loyal Legions
cards.originalText:
在你的维持开始或每当你施放白色咒语时，在忠贞军团祭祠上放置一个充电指示物。
{3}，{T}，牺牲忠贞军团祭祠：忠贞军团祭祠上每有一个充电指示物，便将一个1/1无色秘耳衍生神器生物放进战场。
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a white spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Loyal Legions.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Loyal Legions: Create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token for each charge counter on Shrine of Loyal Legions.

cards.name: Shrine of Piercing Vision
cards.originalText:
在你的维持开始或每当你施放蓝色咒语时，在锐利视线祭祠上放置一个充电指示物。
{T}，牺牲锐利视线祭祠：检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为锐利视线祭祠上的充电指示物数量。 将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a blue spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Piercing Vision.
{T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Piercing Vision: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of charge counters on Shrine of Piercing Vision. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Sickleslicer

cards.flavor:
「你的自我有着不健康的附加物。 我可以帮得上忙。」
～合成执行人麻卡特
cards.name: Soul Conduit
cards.originalText: {6}，{T}：两位目标牌手彼此交换总生命。
cards.text: {6}, {T}: Two target players exchange life totals.

cards.flavor:
「让弗霖凯瞧瞧，进展不一定需要尖牙利爪。」
～合成执行人麻卡特
cards.name: Spellskite
cards.originalText: {U/P}：将目标咒语或异能的目标改为蔑咒兽。 （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。）
cards.text: {U/P}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

cards.flavor: 没有仇敌可供投注精力，机械牧师便有时间沉迷于新科学。
cards.name: Surge Node
cards.originalText:
翻腾节点进战场时上面有六个充电指示物。
{1}，{T}，从翻腾节点上移去一个充电指示物：在目标神器上放置一个充电指示物。
cards.text:
Surge Node enters the battlefield with six charge counters on it.
{1}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Surge Node: Put a charge counter on target artifact.

～泰兹瑞
cards.name: Torpor Orb
cards.originalText: 进战场的生物不会触发异能。
cards.text: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

cards.flavor:
「感谢食灵妖监管行止，导正无知下仆。」

cards.name: Trespassing Souleater
cards.originalText: {U/P}：入侵食灵妖本回合不能被阻挡。 （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。）
cards.text: {U/P}: Trespassing Souleater can't be blocked this turn. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

cards.flavor:

cards.name: Unwinding Clock
cards.originalText: 在其他牌手的重置步骤中，重置所有由你操控的神器。
cards.text: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

cards.flavor:
「原来连我们世界的心脏都屈服了。」

cards.text:

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: You gain 1 life.
